problem_text_cn: 如图,已知圆锥的底面半径为3,母线长为4,则它的侧面积是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the radius of the bottom surface of the cone is N_0, and the length of the generatrix is N_1, then its lateral area is ()
raw_answer: 解:底面半径为3,则底面周长=6π,侧面积=\frac{1}{2}×6π×4=12π．故选:B．
raw_comment: 本题利用了圆的周长公式和扇形面积公式求解．
